rising.name: renv
rising.title: Project Environments
rising.description:
A dependency management toolkit for R. Using 'renv', you
can create and manage project-local R libraries, save the state
of these libraries to a 'lockfile', and later restore your
library as required.

rising.name: renv

rising.description:
A dependency management toolkit for R. Using 'renv', you
can create and manage project-local R libraries, save the state
of these libraries to a 'lockfile', and later restore your
library as required.
